mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_team(team_id, captain_id, team_name, team_state, team_headcount, competition_id, team_content) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{captain.userId}, #{teamName}, #{teamState}, #{teamHeadcount}, #{competition.competitionId}, #{teamContent})
mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state,t.team_headcount team_headcount, t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_user_team ut ON t.team_id = ut.team_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{v} AND ut.user_id != t.captain_id

SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state, t.apply_time apply_time,t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name, u.user_id user_id FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_user_team ut ON t.team_id = ut.team_id LEFT JOIN sys_suser u ON t.captain_id = u.user_id WHERE (t.captain_id = #{userId} OR ut.user_id = #{userId}) AND t.competition_id = #{competitionId}

SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state,t.team_headcount team_headcount, t.apply_time apply_time,t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name, c.competition_people_sum competition_people_sum FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id WHERE t.captain_id = #{v}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_team( team_id, user_id) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.sex, u.user_type, u.student_id, u.orgnization, u.academy, u.major, u.phonenumber, u.email,org.organization_name FROM t_user_team ut LEFT JOIN sys_suser u On ut.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_organization org ON org.organization_id = u.orgnization WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND u.user_id != #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_team SET team_name = #{teamName}, team_content = #{teamContent} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_team WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_team SET team_state = #{teamState}, apply_time = #{applyTime},audit_state = #{auditState} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}

UPDATE t_team SET team_state = #{teamState}, team_headcount = #{teamHeadcount} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state,t.team_headcount team_headcount FROM t_team t WHERE t.team_id = #{v}

SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.apply_time apply_time,t.audit_state audit_state, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.sex, u.user_type, u.student_id, u.orgnization, u.academy, u.major, u.phonenumber, u.email, org.organization_name FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN sys_suser u ON t.captain_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_organization org ON org.organization_id = u.orgnization WHERE t.competition_id = #{v} AND t.team_state = 3 ORDER BY t.audit_state ASC,t.apply_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_team SET team_headcount = team_headcount-1 WHERE team_id = #{v}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.sex, u.user_type, u.student_id, u.orgnization, u.academy, u.major, u.phonenumber, u.email, u.password,r.role_id role_id, r.role_name role_name, org.organization_name FROM t_user_team ut LEFT JOIN sys_suser u ON ut.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_organization org ON org.organization_id = u.orgnization WHERE ut.team_id = #{v}
